page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: Interview with Harry Avison Harry Avison is employed by Mr.Gibbons,present owner of Holton Hall.He has lived in the village for 60 years and lives in an estate house with his sister.He used to work on the farm but is now the gardener at the hall.He has noticed changes in the village in the last 12 years with new houses being built and more people moving in.He has also noticed changes in agriculture with more mechanisation.Sixty years ago about 80% of the houses were occupied by estate workers but now about 20% are. Harry likes to shop in Holton but also goes to Caistor and Grimsby.
